text: Pellecebra is an Afrotropical monotypic genus of moths in the family Lasiocampidae. Its sole species, Pellecebra superba, is found in the Democratic Republic of the Congo--which is its type locality--the Republic of the Congo, Cameroon, Gabon and Nigeria. The holotype of P. superba is part of the collection of Lepidoptera specimen at Museum Witt Munich. ==References== Category:Lasiocampidae Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths described in 2012 Category:Monotypic moth genera
title: Pellecebra
